nodes.documentation:
@title StockRoomBase
@notice Defines collections, mappings, and structs for the StockRoom side of the In-game Pro Shop System

nodes.documentation: @dev modifier to scope access to owner of given shop
nodes.name: onlyShopOwner

@title StockRoomBase

nodes.name: StockRoomBase

pause().details: called by the system administrator to pause, triggers stopped state

unpause().details: called by the ystem administrator to un-pause, returns to normal state

upgradeContract(address).details: called by a system administrator to  mark the smart contract as upgraded,     in case there is a serious breaking bug. This method stores the new contract     address and emits an event to that effect. Clients of the contract should     update to the new contract address upon receiving this event.     *      This contract will remain paused indefinitely after such an upgrade.

userdoc.notice: Defines collections, mappings, and structs for the StockRoom side of the In-game Pro Shop System
